title: 이달의소녀탐구 #486 (LOONA TV #486)
summary:
The shooting of the teaser is finished and they are all excited.
0:14 -- HaSeul: "Today everyone dressed in the same clothes for the teaser so I wonder how it will turn out"
0:19 -- Yves mentions how acting like Chrysalis was the most impressive idea. They all make some noise for the director.
0:34 -- HaSeul talks about her hair after Chuu points them out.
0:50 -- They all end the episode by making Butterflies with their hands.
